event.title: Barefaced Liar (Duo) Live and Awesome
event.description:
Barefaced Liar is a LIVE band based out of the capital city of India, New Delhi.

They are known to perform modern rock music. The band has performed in numerous gigs, college festivals, private parties, etc.

The band’s major influences are Beatles, Pink Floyd, Zeppelin, Jimi Hendrix, Stevie Ray Vaughan, Metallica, Tool, Stone Temple Pilots, etc.
